com.worizon.jsonrpc - package com.worizon.jsonrpc
This package contains all classes that model a RPC transaction.
com.worizon.jsonrpc.annotations - package com.worizon.jsonrpc.annotations
This package contains annotations for the facade Rpc.
com.worizon.jsonrpc.gson - package com.worizon.jsonrpc.gson
This package contains adapters and annotations that depend on or are related to gson framework and configure a particular behaviour of serialization and deserialization.
com.worizon.net - package com.worizon.net
This package contains all classes related with network access and HTTP requests.
